name: declarative-tree
description: Generalized way to convert a string to tree, and vice versa. Useful for creating declarative tree tests.

scripts.test: rm -rf coverage; npx jest --clearCache; npx jest ./src --coverage --silent
scripts.build: npm run build-ts; npm run build-md
scripts.pre-bump: npm run dead-files && npm run spell-check && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && git add --all && git commit
scripts.release: npm run pre-bump && npm publish --access public && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-bump && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-bump && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-bump && npm version major && npm publish && npm run after-bump

author: lillallol
